text: @OregonGovBrown But not state workers. Except now Employment. Because state workers aren’t “retail”. But they are HUMAN. Fix this loophole or you’ll have no staff left. I’m begging you! #COVID19 #Oregon #oregondemocrat @ORDems @fox12oregon @ORSenDemocrats @Oregonian @RonWyden @SenJeffMerkley
